## Executive Summary

### Overview
AI-Powered Smart Reply for Customer Support addresses the need for Support agents spend 40% of their time writing repetitive responses to common customer questions, leading to slower response times and agent burnout among Customer support agents, Support team leads, Customer success managers.

### Business Goals
- Reduce average response time by 30%
- Increase agent productivity by 25%
- Improve CSAT scores from 4.2 to 4.5
- Reduce support costs by $200K annually

### Expected Impact
This feature is expected to reach 250 of our user base and deliver meaningful improvements in key metrics.
